ImageCache

From Plasmaworks

Jump to: navigation, search
singleton class ImageCache
  # A simple image caching singleton.
  #
  # First, if you want your images loaded outside of texture sheets,
  # set this flag:
  # 
  #   ImageCache.use_texture_sheets = false
  #
  # Load each image you want to use like this:
  #
  #   Image skatergirl = ImageCache["skatergirl.png"]
  #
  # You can also draw images directly from the cache.  It's a slight 
  # bit of overhead for the hashtable lookup each time but it's not 
  # too bad:
  #
  #   ImageCache["skatergirl.png"].draw( pos )
  #
  # Before loading any new image sets, retain() each of the images
  # in your scene and then call release_unused() to free the rest:
  #
  #   forEach (img in scene.images) ImageCache.retain(img)
  #   ImageCache.release_unused
  #
  # Note: calling release_unused() resets the 'used' flag for all the
  # images that weren't released, so be sure and retain() the images
  # you want to keep in-between calls to release_unused().
  #
  # Created 2009.12.08 by Abe.Pralle@plasmaworks.com

  PROPERTIES
    images()                : HashTable<<String,ImageCacheInfo>>
    use_texture_sheets=true : Logical

  METHODS
    method get( String filename ).Image:
      # Loads or retrieves the image with the given filename, marking
      # it as in use.
      #
      # Example:
      #   Image skatergirl = ImageCache["skatergirl.png"]
      local var mapping = images.find(filename)
      if (mapping?)
        local var info = mapping.value
        info.in_use = true
        return info.image
      endIf

      local Image image
      if (use_texture_sheets) image = Image(filename)
      else image = Image(filename,null)
      images[filename] = ImageCacheInfo(filename,image)
      return image

    method retain( Image image ):
      # Prevents the specified image from being released from the
      # cache on the next call to release_unused.  Note: you
      # do not need to obtain the image you have just gotten
      # from ImageCache["filename"].
      forEach (info in images.values)
        if (info.image is image) info.in_use = true; return
      endForEach
      throw Exception( "No such image in ImageCache." )


    method release_unused:
      # Release unused images and mark all others AS unused.
      forEach (info in images.values.to_List) 
        # Note: the to_List forces a necessary copy of the values
        if (not info.in_use) 
          info.image.release
          images.remove(info.filename)
        else
          info.in_use = false
        endIf
      endForEach
endClass

class ImageCacheInfo( String filename, Image image, Logical in_use=true );
  # Image Cache meta-info storage class.
